ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also another major reason for me wanting money. I have several very good online friends that are more along the lines of fighters and a permanently
ygData.messageBody:
There is also another major reason for me wanting
money. I have several very good online friends that
are more along the lines of fighters and a permanently
broke cleric. There is nothing like giving a nice item
as a present to a friend. That is one of the major
reasons why I am broke, since I recently(level
13)bought a combine scimitar for a friend so he could
hit ghouls and wisps. :)

Darkmoon

--- Tony B <tonyb72@...> wrote:
> From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
> sure, those things are nice, but why choose money
> over xp? once you are
> over L20 you can start gathering unto you those
> things that are yours =)
> its better to spend 2 weeks getting to L20 than
> spend 2 weeks getting 100pp
> so you can get an item, and only being L18. trust
> me, patience is the way
> to go- i still have yet to buy any items, and i am
> L24. not only that, but
> i have some rather good stuff. (does trading count?
> ive made some good
> trades). i take that back. at L10 i bought a dagger
> of marnek, and later on
> i bought some int rings. i also bought a dragoon
> dirk. but total that was
> around 50pp, if that.
>
> belphenor
>
>
>
> >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >
> >hm...silly question, but where is the single spawn
> >aviak? I am not that familiar with the zone, since
> it
> >seems to be extremly crowded all the time.
> >
> >I want money to buy some of the perks...like a
> >savant's cap, or intelligence earrings. :)
> >
> >--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> > > From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> > >
> > > Overall I don't see any use for money except
> buying
> > > important spells at
> > > those levels. As of right now I would suggest
> that
> > > you take on some Aviak
> > > Guards in Lake Rathe and fight them for a bit.
> They
> > > have decent loot and
> > > great exp. All you really need to do is level
> money
> > > will begin to roll in
> > > the 20's and you'll be fine again money wise.
> > >
> > > Naeeldar
> > >

> > > >
> > > >Any ideas, please? :)
